The disconneted exceptions are "excpected", but we don't need to log them. 
I'll also investigate the other exception from source lookup.

Fixed the disconnected exception in JDIModelPresentation - we no longer log 
it. I will open a new bug report for the IllegalStateException. It is a bit 
more involved to fix, but not critical.

Filed bug 91419 for the zip file problem.

Please verify, Kevin.
